Description: It is involved in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of a wide range of both acute and chronic diseases affecting different parts of the body.
It is the branch of medicine concerned with the physical, mental, and social health of infants, children, and adolescents from birth up to the age of 18.
It focused on the teeth, gums, and mouth. It consists of the study, diagnosis, prevention, management, and treatment of diseases, disorders, and conditions of the mouth
It specializing in conditions that affect the urinary tract in men, women and children, and diseases that affect the reproductive system.
Obstetrics deals with pregnancy and its associated procedures and complications, gynaecology involves treating women who are not pregnant.
It's the specialized field of medicine that focuses on the health of the eye. It includes the anatomy, physiology and diseases that may affect the eye.
Orthopedics deals with the study and treatment of abnormalities of the locomotor system, both of congenital or infectious origin or due to sequelae after trauma.
Ear, nose and throat (ENT) surgeons diagnose, evaluate and manage diseases of the head and neck.
It's a surgical specialty involving the restoration, reconstruction or alteration of the human body. It can be divided into two main categories: reconstructive surgery and cosmetic surgery.
